about_the_game:
Varsity High School Football brings the intensity, tradition, and glory of Friday Night Lights to life like never before.

Immerse yourself in true-to-life realistic gameplay, officially licensed gear, and all the high-stakes drama of leading your team to victory. Varsity puts you in control of every heart-pounding moment on the field.

Each town, county, and state offers a unique football atmosphere, creating a customizable sandbox where your decisions shape the future.

  • State Playoff Structure

    • You decide whether your state invites 8, 16, 32, or 64 teams into the playoffs for your classification

  • Player Details

    • Names, Numbers, Height, Class, Ratings

    • Equipment (exposed backplate, sleeves, gloves, hanging mouth guard, above the knee pads, and more)

  • Team and School

    • Location (any town/city with more than 1,000 people)

      • This allows us to use real life data for weather, demographics, estimated school size, and more

    • Facilities

      • Stands/bleacher size and type

      • Scoreboard style

      • Press box size and type

    • Team branding

      • Colors

      • Jersey and pant styles

With our emergent Dynasty Mode, you’ll guide your team through multiple seasons, navigating rivalries, building relationships with players and parents, managing your coaching staff, and securing support from boosters.

The decisions you make will change the outcome of your experience throughout the season. Be careful what you promise because the strength of your relationships matter. No two seasons will be the same.

Triumph could see you celebrated as a local legend, but one wrong move might thrust you into the eye of a media storm, sparking the wildest coaching carousel in video game history.

The future of football starts here—this is Varsity.

name: Varsity High School Football
short_description: Immerse yourself in true-to-life realistic gameplay, officially licensed gear, and all the high-stakes drama of leading your team to victory. Whether you’re a coach masterminding strategies or a player chasing the dream, Varsity puts you in control of every heart-pounding moment on the field.
